评论详情: These are nice and deep with a black velvet-lined foam pad with appropriate cutouts for jewelry. I love that they're deeper than the ones I had been using, which makes them more flexible in their usage. They're sturdy and reusable which I love! They are wrapped in white for a beautiful, clean presentation and were priced right for the quantity and, dare I say, low for the quality! I love the feeling of opening and closing the box - it's easy and fun, like treasure must be hidden in a box that slides like a drawer! I'm hoping that's how my customers experience them. The only drawback and not a deal breaker - there aren't any elastics to hold jewelry pieces in place.
I Laser engraved these with my mini engraver with my logo. I absolutely love these for my long necklaces. I think my customers will appreciate them and they are giftable.

These are super high quality gift boxes. I love the simple aesthetic--understated elegance with a premium feel. They take a hot emboss very well if you plan on applying your own branding. I'm working on a line of pens that I'll be using these with--they'll be perfect!
